title: Terry B Chasing a Tall Bike in NYC
content:
Terry B has mastered shooting video in NYC and in this video, he displays that following ZeroCool on a pick up and drop off while riding his “TallCity” fixed gear tall bike. Watch ’til the end for a bike check!

The post Terry B Chasing a Tall Bike in NYC appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
